caption.p: The number of unique miRNAs present in the apical and basal spikelets of either in V1 (SR-159) or V2 (SR-157) during post-anthesis (0, 5 and 10 days) taken together ( a). The unique miRNA present in the apical and basal spikelets of V1 and V2 ( b), miRNAs having target genes in the ethylene pathways in the apical and basal spikelets ( c) and miRNAs having target genes in the auxin pathways in the apical and basal spikelets ( d) arranged separately during post-anthesis (0, 5 and 10 days).
